entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 32.

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29 with temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 29 with temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. Wind chill minus 38 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 7 April 2023
